title: Fashions, flowers and favourites
creator_credit: Syd Wood, Frank Killian, Tourist Development Authority of Victoria and Movietonenews
brief_description: Shows numerous scenes in and around Melbourne (1962?) including activities such as the Melbourne Cup, sailing on Albert Park Lake, eating out and nightlife, the Miss Australia judging, the Sidney Myer Music Bowl and the Royal Botanic Gardens. Commentry by David Low and Bert Bryant.
